items.question: Is orthodontic treatment only suitable for children?
items.answer: No! Adults and teenagers also undergo orthodontic treatment today, and innovative technologies make the process comfortable and efficient at any age.

items.question: How long does an average treatment take?
items.answer: Most processes range from one to two years, depending on complexity and alignment method.

items.question: Is it possible to perform invisible alignment?
items.answer: Absolutely. We offer clear aligners and invisible braces techniques ‚Äì according to patient needs.

items.question: Is there pain during treatment?
items.answer: Sometimes there is discomfort in the first hours after installing the appliances, but it subsides quickly.

items.question: How do you maintain the result?
items.answer: After completing the process, you receive a retainer and full instructions for maintaining straight teeth over time.
